entry.title: Sunday: Periods of light snow. High minus 29. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming clear this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
